function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Open data on the french covid-19 epidemic may pose a risk of unauthorized access and misuse.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying on a government database for hospitalization data introduces a risk of data accuracy and integrity issues.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hospitalized patients with biologically confirmed diagnosis of covid-19 or suggestive ct scan","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standardizing hospitalization data using population size","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-pharmaceutical interventions implemented during the epidemic","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multifaceted public health interventions","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of schools, bars, and restaurants","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-consideration of travel bans and enhanced testing","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent school closures and reopenings could lead to the spread of contagious diseases among students and staff.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Phased reopening of non-essential stores, bars, and restaurants may contribute to increased social interaction and transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforced curfews may lead to non-compliance and subsequent increase in gatherings during non-curfew hours, leading to higher transmission of contagious disease.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Controversy over the role of weather conditions in sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on seasonal trends in temperature and humidity for virus transmission","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Normalized iptcc index as a measure of transmission conditions","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmissible diseases such as sars-cov-2 variants of concern vocs may affect transmission rates and public health interventions","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Seasonal variations in weather may impact the transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exponential growth of voc from 0% to 46% nationally in a short timeframe","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data for the bourgogne-franche-comté region on january 27, 2021","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increase in vaccination coverage to approximately 12% by the end of the study period","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Constantly changing policies between private and public measures","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low awareness of the importance of ventilation and air sterilization in reducing the spread of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases.","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of agreed standard for sampling and detection of airborne viruses","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact on healthcare professional and patient-focused outcomes","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Portable air filtration devices as a mitigation strategy for reduced availability of airborne infection isolation facilities","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restriction of access to public green spaces due to covid-19 social distancing measures","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lockdown measures leading to decreased social interaction for older adults","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited assessment of the impact of domestic gardens on wellbeing during lockdown","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of assessment of the contribution of urban green space to wellbeing","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited studies on the impact of domestic gardens on psychosocial factors and physical health during lockdown","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential lack of information on protective behaviors for prevention of psychiatric disorders during self-isolation","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Older adults being advised to remain at home and avoid social contact during covid-19 lockdown.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anxiety about covid-19 may impact mental health and increase susceptibility to stress-related illnesses.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased outdoor activities, such as gardening, may lead to higher physical activity levels and improved overall wellbeing.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recoding variables may introduce bias and distort the true impact of covid-19 on individual health and well-being.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality in access to green space and nature","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity among older adults","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Opportunities for older adults to exercise have been greatly impacted due to covid-19 lockdown measures.","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to establish cause and effect relationships due to cross-sectional design","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for further lockdown re-instatement at a local or national level","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unintended adverse consequences on health and wellbeing due to global efforts to reduce the transmission of covid-19","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of sars cov-2 coronavirus pandemic","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Large number of confirmed covid-19 cases in europe","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"State of emergency and implementation of preventive or containment quarantine in spain","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of disease transmission within households due to prolonged confinement and increased interaction","category":"Family","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of previous technical studies on confined households and dwellings","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on the impact of domestic spaces on socio-economic and psychological conditions during confinement","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaluation of the impact degree of confinement on public health","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Study of the incidence of home-dwelling relationship in different habitats and urban areas","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confinement at home due to covid-19","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using online forms and surveys may limit the reach to potential participants who do not have internet access.","category":"Participation","confidence":"Medium"}]}
